verses.plain: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

tokens.t: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

verses.plain: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

tokens.t: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

verses.plain: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;

tokens.t: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;

verses.plain: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;

tokens.t: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;

verses.plain: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

tokens.t: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

verses.plain: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;

tokens.t: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her
of Urias;

verses.plain: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;

tokens.t: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;

verses.plain: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;

tokens.t: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;

verses.plain: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;

tokens.t: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;

verses.plain: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;

tokens.t: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;

verses.plain: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:

tokens.t: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:

verses.plain: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;

tokens.t: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;

verses.plain: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

tokens.t: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

verses.plain: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

tokens.t: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

verses.plain: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

tokens.t: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

verses.plain: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

tokens.t: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

verses.plain: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.

tokens.t: So all the generations from Abraham to David
fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon
fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ
fourteen generations.

verses.plain: ¶ Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

tokens.t: ¶ Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

verses.plain: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

tokens.t: Then Joseph her husband, being a just
, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

verses.plain: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

tokens.t: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

verses.plain: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

tokens.t: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

verses.plain: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

tokens.t: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

verses.plain: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

tokens.t: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

verses.plain: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

tokens.t: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

verses.plain: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.

tokens.t: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
